original_text: And, behold, a woman, which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years, came behind him, and touched the hem of his garment:
korean_text: 열두 해 동안이나 혈루증으로 앓는 여자가 예수의 뒤로 와서 그 겉옷 가를 만지니

sentences.original_text: a woman, which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years,
sentences.korean_translation: 십이 년 동안 출혈하는 앓는 여자가

sentences.original_text: and touched the hem of his garment:
